AVSEC Order No. - 02 /2015

Subject: - National Civil Aviation Security Programme 2015.

In exercise of powers conferred by Section SA of the Aircraft Act, 1934, delegated to
him vide Government of India, Ministry of Civil Aviation Notification No. 1797 dated
03/07/1997, for the purpose of securing the aircraft operations, the Commissioner of Security
(CA) directs that the NCASP which has been reviewed and updated to comply with Standards
of Annex-17 with security related provisions of Annex-9 to the Convention on Intemational
Civil Aviation, shall be implemented by all age: connected with aviation security in
India.

2.. This is in supersession of AVSEC Order no. 12/2011 dated 02/02/2011 in this regard.

3. Any violation of this AVSEC Order shall attract penalty under Section 1]A of the
Aircraft Act 1934.

Commissioner of Security (CA)
